text: Ministers Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe, Mrs Thalatha Athukorale and Director General of Government Information Dr. Ranga Kalansooriya are also seen.The Official Photo Album of the visit ofNepal President Bidhya Devi Bhandariwas handed over to him by Minister of Parliamentary Reforms and Mass Media Gayantha Karunathilake at the Hilton Hotel before she left the island after a four day successful visit yesterday (16th May). Ministers Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe, Mrs Thalatha Athukorale and Director General of Government Information Dr. Ranga Kalansooriya are also seen.
title: Picture album for Nepal President
